items.text: full on off, and defended off the front foot. Stopped by the fielder at short cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, but Hope drags a slog-sweep from outside off. Gets a lot of meat behind that shot, and that's four for West Indies
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: full just outside off, and defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: full on off, and he goes onto the back foot and flicks it square to the leg side
items.postText: Lou: "I certainly take the point about the slow scoring rate of Gayle's partners but, especially given Lewis's record, how much of this is down to Bangladesh bowling and/or the pitch? Is Gayle's effort even more remarkable then?" -- Lewis struggles when the ball isn't coming onto his bat. His record at home is, for a lack of a better word, disastrous.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: good length on middle, and fended off the back foot
items.postText: MahneelMusa: "Just like you can react to Facebook comments, it'd be awesome if we could react to comments on cricinfo. Get it to the technical guys please, Sreshth. I really wanted to react haha to Sibin's comment here. "
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: full on middle, and defended off the front foot to mid off
items.postText: Mike Watkin : "Gayle got himself out. Last 17 banks only 5 runs. Just not able to get the ball away. Agreed hope is hopeless though. "
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: full on off, and that's been slog-swept to the leg side. Enough time to scamper back for two
items.postText:
Umair from Fiji: "And that only successful 300+ chase was against Pakistan and their mighty bowling lineup. Something for Windies fans. "

Rezaul Karim : "Rubel was never a test bowler. It was Bangladesh team management decision to keep him for test even though he doesn't enjoy that format. But his odi record is way better than his recognitions! He is the hero for for Bangladesh."
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.text: good length on middle, and that's been pulled away! Wasn't too short, but Hetmyer did well to bend his knees, ensuring he was under the ball
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, FOUR runs

items.text: full outside off, and angling across the batsman. Tries to drive but misses
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, and he runs it down to third man off the back foot
items.postText: Michael: "Hope is barting like the typical west indian batsman Hit one boundary and face 5 dots " -- That's a strike-rate of 75, so not too bad, but instead Hope's at 52 point something
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.text: full on middle, and he takes a big stride forward to drive down to long off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, and that's been turned off his pads to the leg side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, forcing Hope to reach at it. Mistimes the drive to the off side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: overpitched outside off, and Hope tries to drive through the covers once again. But finds cover point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: drifting down leg, but Hope can't play it fine. Instead mistimes a shot to square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, and Hetmyer prefers going backwards to defend
items.postText: Sashi Kurucheti: "Sorry Sreshth but a boundary and 5 dots means a strike rate of 66.66" -- My apologies! I was never good at math. A highest score of 83% in class six. Went downhill thereafter...
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: full on off, and Hope punches this down the ground. Off the bat's inside half, though, and therefore Rubel intercepts
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and crunched through the covers (off the back foot) to deep extra cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle, and he inside edges this to the fine-leg boundary! Cramped for space as he attempted the punch off the back foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, FOUR runs

items.text: good length on off, and defended off the back foot. But the ball goes past his outside edge and into the keeper's gloves. Bangladesh appeal, but not given! They don't have a review. Mashrafe thinks that was out, but alas. Replays show there was no edge
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: good length on middle, and he stays on the back foot, before running it down to third man
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: good length on middle, and defended tentatively to mid off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and he cuts it away to deep point for a single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: uses his feet! Full on leg stump, but he comes down the ground to try and lift off. Only manages to drill this down the ground to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle, and angling into his body. Flicked away to square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run
